author: QuickMountTV LLC
title: QuickMountTV Launches "Heroes Initiative" Granting 100 Franchises to Deserving Veterans -- QuickMountTV | PRLog
text: QuickMountTV Launches "Heroes Initiative" Granting 100 Franchises to Deserving Veterans As a gesture of gratitude for their selfless service and unwavering dedication to the nation, QuickMountTV is extending this unique opportunity to veterans seeking to embark on an entrepreneurial journey. By: QuickMountTV CINCINNATI - April 18, 2024 - As a gesture of gratitude for their selfless service and unwavering dedication to the nation, QuickMountTV is extending this unique opportunity to veterans seeking to embark on an entrepreneurial journey. The initiative aims to empower veterans with the tools and resources needed to establish thriving businesses in the rapidly growing home entertainment industry. "QuickMountTV is deeply committed to supporting those who have served our country," said Commander, U.S. Navy (RET), JP Bolat VP of Veteran Programs QuickMountTV. "Through the Heroes Initiative, we are honored to provide veterans with the opportunity to build successful businesses and achieve financial independence." The selected veterans will receive comprehensive training, ongoing support, and access to QuickMountTV's proven business model, enabling them to seamlessly integrate into the booming home entertainment market. "We understand the challenges veterans may face when transitioning to civilian life, and we believe entrepreneurship offers a path to meaningful and fulfilling careers," added Michael Mehditash, President QuickMountTV. "By leveraging our expertise and resources, we are dedicated to helping veterans thrive as business owners." Eligible veterans interested in participating in the Heroes Initiative can apply online at . |Source||:||QuickMountTV| |:| |QuickMountTV LLC PRs|
